section.title: sales history time-phased by product category Time-Phased Sales History by Product Category
section.para: To view time-phased Sales history by Product Category, select the "Time-Phased Sales History by Product Category" option. The following screen will appear:

mediaobject.caption: Time-Phased Sales History by Product Category

section.para: When displaying time-phased Sales history by Product Category, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Select to display time-phased Sales history by Product Category for all Sites.
Specify Site whose time-phased Sales history by Product Category you want to display.
Select to display time-phased Sales history for all Product Categories.
Specify Product Category whose time-phased Sales history you want to display.
Enter a Product Category pattern to select a range of Product Categories. Refine your search using Regular Expressions.
Select to display Inventory Units of Measure.
Select to display Capacity Units of Measure.
Capacity Units: Select to display Alternate Capacity Units of Measure.

note.para: The type of Calendar and number of Calendar periods you choose to display may have an impact on response time. The data may take longer to display, depending on the time frame requested.

listitem.para: Select the Calendar you want to use for the report. Associated Calendar periods will be displayed.

Select as many periods as you want to display. Selected periods correspond to Calendar specified in the "Calendar" field. Select individual periods or groups of periods together. To select an individual period, highlight the period using your mouse button. The period is now selected. To select a sequence of periods, highlight the first in the sequence using your mouse button. Then, holding down the SHIFT key on your keyboard, highlight the last period in the sequence. The entire sequence is now selected. To select periods that are out of sequence (e.g., January, April, July, October), highlight the first period in the group. Then, holding down the CTRL key on your keyboard, highlight the next period you want to select. Continue highlighting periods with the CTRL key depressed until all desired periods are selected. The entire group is now selected.
Display lists time-phased Sales history by Product Category, using the specified parameters. Prices are normalized to the Base Currency using the Currency Exchange Rate effective on the Invoice Date.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen, returning you to the application desktop.
Select to generate the display, using the specified parameters.
Runs the report associated with this screen.
Select to submit report to the Batch Manager.
